channel.title: Akash Pallath's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Akash Pallath's Blog

item.title: More Deep Dreaming
item.description: In my last post, I shared some cool images that I made with Deep Dream. This time, I updated the loss functions in my code, made some changes, and generated deep dreams by iteratively running the Deep Dream algorithm on images. I also made some videos showing the evolution of dreams (into ‘hallucinations’). Here’s what I got: Another deep dream of College Hall at the University of Pennsylvania. Original image from Penn’s public Flickr feed.

item.title: Deep Dreaming
item.description: I finally had the chance to implement Deep Dream (using the pre-trained Inception v3 neural network) as a part of my deep learning journey. It is hard to find the time to code up algorithms that aren’t related to my research, but the stunning visuals that this produced were very rewarding. Here are some cool images I managed to make: Deep dream of College Hall at the University of Pennsylvania. Original image from Penn’s public Flickr feed.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello reader! Watch this space, there’s a lot more coming soon! For now, you can check out my personal website.
